entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 08:31 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
